title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.7 - Use of public wharves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.7 - Use of public wharves

State Regulations

No watercraft shall be docked or berthed at or made fast
to any public wharf except upon the payment of such wharfage, dockages, mooring
charges or other charges as may from time to time be prescribed by the Port

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
